traits.name: Toxin Resilience
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against poisons, and you have resistance against poison damage.

traits.name: Paragon Power
traits.desc:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain your reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Repeat a saving throw against an ongoing effect. You have advantage on the roll.

traits.name: Hydra Blood
traits.desc: When you are hit by a damaging attack, you may regain 3 (1d6) HP.

traits.name: Drag Hooks
traits.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10+1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hooked Toss
traits.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10+1) piercing damage. The target is then flung 20 ft in a direction of Mauss' choice. They are knocked prone and take 6 (2d6) bludgeon damage if they finish adjacent to a large object or wall.

traits.name: Venomous Bite
traits.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage and 6 (1d8 + 2) ongoing poison damage (DC 14 Constitution saving throw).
